results.title: Impact of Endurance Exercise Training on Biomarkers of Aortic Endothelial Damage in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: It seems that exercise along with taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be considered as a therapeutic method by improving @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ and reducing oxidative stress and vascular @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ responses, leading to ameliorating biomarkers function related to @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial damage@@@ in experimental @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ conditions.

results.title: Suppressing endothelial senescence: A comprehensive analysis of metformin's mechanisms and implications.
results.text_hl: Preclinical and clinical studies indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-whether administered as monotherapy or in combination regimens-has demonstrated significant potential in the treatment of @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@ by ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@.
